tool.name: PanCancer targene ccle cell line predictions
tool.description: targene status in ccle cell lines
tool.command: cp -R '$classifier.extra_files_path' '${output_alt_folder.extra_files_path}' && python /data/vijay/git/pancancer/scripts/viz/targene_cell_line_predictions.py --classifier '${output_alt_folder.extra_files_path}' #if $targenes and str($targenes): --targenes '$targenes' #end if #if $path_genes and str($path_genes): --path_genes '$path_genes' #end if #if $ccle_rnaseq and $ccle_rnaseq is not None: --ccle_rnaseq '$ccle_rnaseq' #end if #if $ccle_mut and $ccle_mut is not None: --ccle_mut '$ccle_mut' #end if #if $ccle_maf and $ccle_maf is not None: --ccle_maf '$ccle_maf' #end if #if $phar_data and $phar_data is not None: --phar_data '$phar_data' #end if && @OUTPUT_ALT_FOLDER_HTML@

param.label: Comma separated string of HUGO targene symbols
param.name: targenes

param.label: string of the genes to extract or genelist file
param.name: path_genes

param.label: Filename for ccle pharmacological data file
param.name: phar_data
